dialogue.text: Hey! Since we’re already talking about kissing, how about bringing back our old tradition of playing spin the bottle on Christmas!?! That sounds fun, right?
Gah! Get that thing away from me! I can’t afford to destroy any more relationships!
Spin the bottle? I blacked out the last time you guys played this and can’t remember how it works.
It’s simple, really. Somebody spins a bottle and then has to kiss whoever it’s aiming at once it {i}stops{/i} spinning.
But what if Kirin spins the bottle and it lands on me? We’re sisters. We’re not allowed to kiss or we’ll never make it into Heaven.
Actually, the Bible is packed to the brim with incest if you manage to filter through all the boring parts. Luckily for you, I have a sexually annotated version back in my room that I’d love to-
Ow.
Bad. We don’t corrupt Karin. It’s against the rules.
So! Who’s up for a rousing game of “Kiss your friends while Imani is out of the room?!”
That’s both irresponsible {i}and{/i} uncalled for! As the next oldest person at the party behind Miss Imai, I forbid this completely.
Unfortunately for you, you’re my plus-one! So you don’t have any say in the fun and exciting games we play, big sister!
Kirin, I highly doubt there is anyone else in this room who is even half as naughty as-
Guess again, Karin!
My name is Rin Rokuhara...and I am here to spin a bottle.
Sh...Should I leave the room?
{i}No.{/i} I will accept my fate regardless of the circumstances.
And if the bottle just so happens to land on Molly, I’ll just have to thank Futaba for always keeping a travel bottle of mouthwash in her bag.
That is, unless there is {i}someone{/i} here who would be disheartened to see me kiss another girl and would like to object before I make any rash decisions!
{i}I said...{/i}Unless there is {i}someone{/i} here who would be disheartened to see me kiss another girl and would like to object before I make any rash decisions!
Why, I believe she’s talking about you.
Oh, really? Sorry. Was I supposed to say something there?
I have no idea what you’re talking about. Do we even know each other? Because I don’t think we do. Who are you again?
In the event that this bottle is aimed at me once it stops spinning, I hope you won’t hold it against me for inserting my tongue into the same mouth you used to insert your tongue into.
Did you really have to word it like that?
I’m gonna do it! I’m gonna spin the bottle! I sure hope no one stops me!
{i}I sure hope no one stops me!{/i}
Oh no. Stop. Don’t do it.
I’m sorry, Futaba...but this is a decision I’ve made and I’ll have to-
Okay! Have fun!
Wha- Futaba?! Since when do you give up so easily?! Get back here and talk me out of this!
Oh my fucking god, just spin the bottle or sit down and give somebody else a turn! You’re hogging all the spotlight!
Aaaaah! Fine! I have nothing left to lose!
Oh, good! You got one of your friends.
That was close. I thought for a second it was going to land on me.
Um...
Sana’s first kiss is going to be with Rin?! Who could have ever predicted-
Actually, I guess that makes sense. After Sensei or me, I guess she’d be the most likely.
Aren’t you straight?
Yes, but crazier things have happened to me before. Kissing Sana was always a possibility.
Congrats, Sana! Congrats, Rin! I always knew you two would end up together!
Um...
It appears that my fate has been decided.
Uh...
And unless {i}somebody{/i} steps in-
Nobody is going to fucking step in! Now shut up and kiss!
Kirin! Don’t say the “K” word in public!
Don’t you mean the “F” word?
No!
Um...
I will do the kissing now. It is going to happen. With both of our mouths.
See? I’m not the only one who words things that way.
Uh...
Here it comes. Here comes the kiss. Better...watch out! Better not cry!
Better not pout, I’m telling you why!
Stop stalling and go, go, go!
{i}I’m sorry.{/i}
Nice.
It...appears that our mouths have touched!
Y...Yeah...
Can we agree to add this to the list of things we will never speak about again?
Y...Yeah...
It appears that it is my turn to take a leap of faith and have what will definitely be my first kiss ever.
Heck yeah! Knock ‘em dead, Kirin! Make it land on Makoto so I can see my two best friends smoochin’ on Christmas!
I will do my best.
What? No! Why is that a thing you want to see?
Idunno. I think it’d be funny. Plus, you two would make cute babies.
Have you really not had the talk with Miku yet? I think she’s overdue.
God, I love this game. Why don’t we play it more often?
Probably because there are roughly only three people who actually want to participate.
Kirin! Stop! I can’t let you do this! As your older sister and current chaperone of the Christmas party, it’s my responsibility to make sure-
Oh, are you guys playing spin the bottle? What did I miss? Who’s kissed who?
It’s just been Rin and Sana so far.
Ahh, I guess that explains why the two of them look so shell-shocked. Anyway, knock ‘em dead Kirin. I hope it lands on Makoto so Miku can see her two best friends kiss.
Kiss! Kiss! Kiss!
Ayane, does Miss Imai hate me? Because I really think she might.
Miss Imai, are you really okay with the girls playing such a...lewd and...inappropriate game?!
Yeah. Are we, like...actually allowed to do this?
Lewd? Y’all ain’t playin’ spin the Henny, are you? Because {i}that{/i} shit I ain’t allowing. Never ends well.
I’m pretty sure it’s a bottle of wine. It was on the table when we got here.
Then yeah, y’all are Gucci. Kissing’s totally cool. Don’t need my permission for that. Just keep your hands to yourselves in the room and go hide in the bathroom if you {i}need{/i} to do more.
More?! What else is there?!
{i}Ahem.{/i} There is-
Sorry, Molly! Don’t have all day! Need to kiss girls now!
Kirin, stop! I’ll support you no matter who you love, but I don’t want to watch my little sister...k...{i}kiss{/i} someone!
Then close your eyes, Karin! Because there ain’t no turnin’ back now!
Okay. Maybe we {i}shouldn’t{/i} be playing this game. Because I ain’t familiar enough with the legal system to know whether or not what’s about to go down is allowed.
Heck yeah! This is even better than Kirin and Makoto! Kirin and Karin’s a whole new level of awesome!
Oh god...I can’t look.
I can’t look {i}away.{/i}
Uhh...
Merry Christmas, Noriko.
Thank...you?
Ahh, the gift of love. How beautiful.
Damn it, Tsuneyo. We were {i}this{/i} close to seeing one of my top tags come to life. How come bad things always happen on Christmas?
Probably because bad things are always happening in every facet of the tragic lives we live.
But tragedy is just the spice we use to-
Didn’t you already get a wistful Christmas monologue at one of our other parties? Can’t you let somebody else handle this one?
Unfortunately, there is no one in this room more talented and better at speaking than me. But I will remain silent if it allows the rest of you to feel as if you are sufficient.
{i}Ahem.{/i}
Hello, madam. Care for a drink?
Sure. If by “drink” you mean “quick makeout session while everyone watches.”
I meant “drink.”
Yeah, I’ll just...take this for a second. Thanks.
Nevermind. The drink is gone.
First the mistletoe, now the bottle. It’s kind of like fate itself {i}wants{/i} us to kiss today.
Sure. Except for the part where the bottle didn’t actually land on me and your sister gave it to me as a Christmas present.
Honestly, though...if you really think about it, it’s kind of weird that we {i}haven’t{/i} kissed yet.
Is it?
Yeah. I mean...we definitely flirt with each other more than any other dorm. And between the way you throw yourself at Sensei and the way I throw myself at...uhh...
Everything?
Yeah. What you said.
Between all of that, it just feels a little weird that we keep postponing it when we know it’ll happen eventually. Like...shouldn’t we just rip the bandage off now and go for it?
I suppose that’s a relatively mature way of approaching this situation.
There is no use in delaying the inevitable, after all. And this may have a positive effect on our lives from this point onward if we go through with it. But to what extent, I’m not sure.
It’s like Gandhi once said. “The future depends on what we do in the present.”
And the present is now. Which means we must kiss.
Correct. It’s what Gandhi would want.
Well, we definitely don’t want to disappoint Gandhi.
For the future.
For Gandhi.
Mn...
Mmf...
Yeaaaah! Get your tongue in there!
Miku, you’re clearly misreading just how much they actually want to-
Oh.
Mm!~
Mmf...mnch...mmm!
YEAAAAH! LET’S GOOOOOO!
Ah-?
Girls! What barrier is there that love cannot break?! Your action expresses your priorities! In doing something, do it with love or never do it at all!
{i}Ahem.{/i} R-Right!
Be the change you wish to see in the-
Gandhi never actually said that.
What?
{i}Yeah. The actual quote is like a paragraph long, but the closest he comes is “If we could change ourselves, the tendencies in the world would also change.”{/i}
{i}Oh that wouldn’t look good on posters or bags at all. I get why we changed it.{/i}
{size=-10}{i}Exactly! You see...we, as a society-{/i}{/size}
Ahh...Christmas. Or as we called it back in Nam — the smooching holiday.
Why are girls kissing each other? Transference can only occur between a man and a woman. They are going to darken their souls with such inappropriate contact.
Yasu? When the heck did {i}you{/i} get here? We ain’t seen ya all night and the party’s already in full force now that we’re spinnin’ bottles.
I’ve been here the whole night. Your eyes just neglected to inform you that my existence is worth paying any attention to. And rightfully so!
No. You, like...literally ain’t been here. I’ve been standin’ near the door.
I was in the other party room. With our new classmates.
{i}New{/i} classmates?...
Yes!
Yasu...we ain’t gettin’ any new classmates. And we’ve only got one party room.
Then who gave me this?
Is that a frickin’ crab?! Where the hell’d you get a crab?!
The other party room.
I already told ya! We ain’t got another party room! Which means ya wandered into some stranger’s hotel and...I still don’t know how the crab comes into play here! The heck was goin’ on in that room?!
I’m unsure. They did not speak the same language as me — and they neglected to take the words of my Lord to heart when I tried to inform them of His message.
But they were very nice and gave me food they cooked in a large pot! As well as this award for winning a game they called “Jenga!”
Makoto! Get your butt over here! Yasu won a crab from a Jenga match against strangers and I ain’t equipped to handle this like you are!
Ugh. Again?
Again?! How often does this happen?!
The time has come for the Gem of the Emerald Isle to redeem herself and reclaim the pride of her motherland.
And...how exactly will kissing some girl decided by a bottle make Ireland proud of you?
How foolish. The succubus has clearly never studied the practices of your homeland, Emerald Guardian.
Succubus?
Bam. Zoom. Joke complete.
Hey. That’s {i}my{/i} line.
The curse ends now!
Ancient...dragon...slash...spin move!
You’d never survive the Battle of Kumon-mi with weak ability names like that.
Silence, mortal! My fate is in your hands now, bottle!
Ahh! No fair! That’s who {i}I{/i} wanted! How come Molly gets Imani and I get my roommate?!
Wow! Okay, Kirin! Last time I kiss you in public.
You don’t want me. I’m a 6/10.
And I’m likely a 3! It matters not to me, Miss Imai!
P...Please be gentle, though. I am quite frail.
And {i}I{/i} am quite thirsty. Anyone want a drink from the gift shop? One that {i}isn’t{/i} Dr. Pepper or wine since those are the only beverages we thought to bring this year?
W-Wait! My kiss!
Oh! Yeah, sorry. I’m kind of busy for the next few years, so if you could just wait until then, that’d be {i}great.{/i}
I bet Sensei would never saymnmmfppphphph?!?!
Please be quiet. All of your yelling is starting to give me a headache.
Wha?!...Unhand me, bird woman!
{i}Further away...in the second half of town...{/i}
